title: Getting Started
content: Install ContextVault in seconds. Works on macOS, Linux, and Windows. Two-tier documentation system for Claude Code.

title: macOS/Linux Installation
content: Install on macOS or Linux using curl. Run the bash installer script from ctx-vault.com.

title: Windows Installation
content: Install on Windows using PowerShell. Native PowerShell installer with Git Bash support for hooks.

title: Upgrade Guide
content: Complete guide to upgrading ContextVault. Update global installation, restart Claude Code, then upgrade each project.

title: Global Upgrade
content: Upgrade global ContextVault installation with curl installer. Updates CLAUDE.md, commands, and hooks.

title: Project Upgrade
content: Upgrade project-level ContextVault with /ctx-upgrade command. Updates project CLAUDE.md and settings.

title: /ctx-init
content: Initialize ContextVault in the current project. Creates .claude/vault directory with index.md.

title: /ctx-doc
content: Quick document a learning, feature, or finding. General purpose documentation command.

title: /ctx-error
content: Document a bug fix or error resolution. Records error message, root cause, and solution.

title: /ctx-decision
content: Document an architectural or technical decision. Records options considered, reasoning, and trade-offs.

title: /ctx-plan
content: Document implementation plan for multi-step tasks. Track progress and goals.

title: /ctx-bootstrap
content: Auto-scan codebase and generate comprehensive documentation. Creates architecture doc and feature docs.

title: /ctx-snippet
content: Save a useful code snippet for reuse. Store patterns and utilities.

title: /ctx-intel
content: Document codebase exploration findings. Record architecture and patterns discovered.

title: /ctx-handoff
content: Create session handoff summary for continuity. Helps next session continue where you left off.

title: /ctx-search
content: Search across vault documents. Find existing documentation by topic.

title: /ctx-read
content: Read a document by ID. View full content of a vault document.

title: /ctx-update
content: Update an existing document by ID. Modify vault documentation.

title: /ctx-new
content: Create a new document with guided routing. Choose global or project vault.

title: /ctx-link
content: Link related documents together. Create connections between vault docs.

title: /ctx-note
content: Add a quick note to existing document. Append information without full edit.

title: /ctx-status
content: Show vault status and statistics. View document counts and health.

title: /ctx-health
content: Check vault health and fix issues. Verify index consistency.

title: /ctx-mode
content: Switch between local, global, or full mode. Change vault scope.

title: /ctx-explain
content: Explain a concept and save to vault. Document understanding of topics.

title: /ctx-quiz
content: Test knowledge retention from vault docs. Review documented learnings.

title: /ctx-share
content: Export vault docs for sharing. Create shareable documentation.

title: /ctx-import
content: Import external documentation into vault. Add existing docs to vault.

title: /ctx-upgrade
content: Upgrade ContextVault to latest version. Update installation.

title: /ctx-changelog
content: View ContextVault changelog and version history. See what's new.

title: /ctx-help
content: Show all ContextVault commands and usage. Display help information.

title: Two-Tier Architecture
content: Global vault at ~/.claude/vault for cross-project knowledge. Project vault at ./.claude/vault for project-specific docs.

title: Document Prefixes
content: G### prefix for global documents. P### prefix for project documents. Automatic ID assignment.

title: Index System
content: Index.md files track all documents. Always read indexes first. Update index after every change.

title: Smart Hooks
content: Automatic reminders to document work. SessionStart, PreToolUse, and Stop hooks. Configurable enforcement.

title: Enforcement Levels
content: Light, balanced, and strict enforcement modes. Control how aggressively hooks remind you to document.

title: Vault Modes
content: Local mode uses only project vault. Global mode uses only global vault. Full mode uses both.

title: Settings File
content: settings.json configures vault behavior. Set mode, enforcement, and limits.

title: Document Limits
content: Max 50 global docs, 50 project docs. Max 100 lines per document. Max 15 words per summary.

title: First Project Setup
content: Tutorial for setting up ContextVault in your first project. Step by step initialization.

title: Documenting Bug Fixes
content: Best practices for documenting bug fixes with ctx-error. Include error, cause, solution.

title: Session Handoffs
content: How to create effective session handoffs. Ensure continuity between sessions.

title: Why documents not loading?
content: Check that index.md exists and is properly formatted. Run ctx-health to diagnose issues.

title: How to migrate existing docs?
content: Use ctx-import to bring external documentation into the vault. Follow naming conventions.

title: Hooks not working?
content: Hooks require Claude Code settings. On Windows, Git Bash is needed for hook support.
